parameters.name: Names
parameters.description: The name of the encryption parameter. Multiple encryption parameters can form a JSON array in the format of \["xxxxxxxxx", "yyyyyyyyy", â€¦ "zzzzzzzzz"]. Each JSON array can contain a maximum of 10 encryption parameters. Multiple encryption parameters in the array are separated by commas (,).

parameters.name: WithDecryption
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to decrypt the parameter value. Default value: false. Valid values:

*   true
*   false
